meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ailanthus tree.
meanings.sent1: The ailanthic leaves rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The garden had an ailanthic scent after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The ailanthic tree seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed like ailanthic branches in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The ailanthic colors of the tree brightened the whole park.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the ailanthus tree.
meanings.sent1: The painting captured the ailanthic beauty of nature.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had an ailanthic shine under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The cake tasted like an ailanthic blend of flavors.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an ailanthic quality that soothed her.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with ailanthic patterns and colors.
